name: Beast Dungeon
storyline:
The Lich Lord awaits you with powerful magic. Fight your way through ten levels of a dungeon filled to the brim with aggressive monsters in order to take down the big, bad boss. Will you triumph, or will you become just another pile of ashes on the dungeon floor?

Each run, your character starts with different equipment. Gather armor, weapons, spells, and skills to build your strength and defeat the ultimate challenge! Manage your time wisely, because each time you stop to rest, the dungeon grows a little more dangerous.
summary:
A classic roguelike dungeon-crawler game with pixel graphics.

Fight your way through ten levels of a dungeon filled to the brim with aggressive monsters in order to take down the big, bad boss. The Lich Lord awaits you with powerful magic. Will you triumph, or will you become just another pile of ashes on the dungeon floor?

Gather equipment, spells, and skills to build your strength and defeat the ultimate challenge!
